title: FlowDefinition
description: A Globus Flow definition describing an automated workflow. Flows allow you to create automated, reusable, and shareable workflows that can chain together multiple actions. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/ for more information.

StartAt.title: StartAt
StartAt.description: The name of the state where flow execution begins. Must match a key in the States object. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/introduction for more information.

States.title: States
States.description: A mapping of state names to state definitions. Each state performs a task and describes how to transition to the next state. Runs manage a data payload which is passed from each state to the next. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/introduction for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of the flow definition. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/introduction for more information.

ActionProviderHandler.title: ActionProviderHandler
ActionProviderHandler.description: Configuration for an Action Provider handler, specifying the URL and optional scope for the action provider. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "ActionProvider" to indicate this handler targets an Action Provider. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Url.title: Url
Url.description: The HTTPS URL for the Action Provider. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Scope.title: Scope
Scope.description: The authentication scope required to access the Action Provider. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

RegisteredAPIHandler.title: RegisteredAPIHandler
RegisteredAPIHandler.description: Configuration for a Registered API handler, referencing a registered API by its UUID. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "RegisteredAPI" to indicate this handler targets a Registered API. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Id.title: Id
Id.description: The UUID of the Registered API. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Catcher.title: Catcher
Catcher.description: An exception handler that matches specific error types and routes execution to a recovery state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/exceptions for more information.

ErrorEquals.title: ErrorEquals
ErrorEquals.description: An array of error type strings to match (e.g., "ActionUnableToRun", "ActionFailedException", "ActionTimeout"). See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/exceptions for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the state to transition to when the error is caught. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/exceptions for more information.

ResultPath.title: ResultPath
ResultPath.description: A JSONPath expression indicating where to place the error output in the flow data. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/exceptions for more information.

ActionState.title: ActionState
ActionState.description: Submits data to an action provider during flow execution and waits for it to complete. Action states block until reaching completion (SUCCEEDED/FAILED) or WaitTime expiration. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Parameters.title: Parameters
Parameters.description: Object forming the input passed to the action's /run operation. Supports constants, JSONPath references (keys ending in ".$"), and expressions (keys ending in ".="). Mutually exclusive with InputPath. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "Action" to indicate this state invokes an action. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of this state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the next state to transition to. Mutually exclusive with End. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

End.title: End
End.description: When true, the flow run terminates successfully after this state completes. Mutually exclusive with Next. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

ActionUrl.title: ActionUrl
ActionUrl.description: The base URL for the action provider. The system appends methods like /run, /status, /cancel to manage the action lifecycle. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

ActionScope.title: ActionScope
ActionScope.description: Optional authentication scope string for accessing the action. Usually unnecessary as the system queries the action provider for the required scope. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

Handler.title: Handler
Handler.description: Configuration for the action handler — either an ActionProvider (with a URL) or a RegisteredAPI (with a UUID). See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

InputPath.title: InputPath
InputPath.description: A JSONPath expression identifying where input values exist in the current flow state. Mutually exclusive with Parameters. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

ResultPath.title: ResultPath
ResultPath.description: A JSONPath expression indicating where action output is placed in the flow data payload. Defaults to "$" (root) if unspecified. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

WaitTime.title: WaitTime
WaitTime.description: Maximum duration in seconds to wait for action completion. Default: 300 (5 minutes). The flow raises an ActionTimeout exception if the action does not complete within this interval. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/actions for more information.

ExceptionOnActionFailure.title: ExceptionOnActionFailure
ExceptionOnActionFailure.description: When true (default), raises an ActionFailedException if the action fails. Set to false to include the FAILED status in the flow state without raising an exception. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/exceptions for more information.

Catch.title: Catch
Catch.description: An array of exception handlers (Catchers). Each handler specifies error types to match and a target state for recovery. Unhandled exceptions abort the flow. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/exceptions for more information.

RunAs.title: RunAs
RunAs.description: Specifies the identity used to execute the action. "User" (default) uses the invoker's credentials, "Flow" uses the flow's own credentials, or provide a custom role name. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/roles for more information.

AndChoiceRule.title: AndChoiceRule
AndChoiceRule.description: A choice rule that evaluates to true when all nested rules are true. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

And.title: And
And.description: An array of choice rules that must all evaluate to true for this rule to match. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

OrChoiceRule.title: OrChoiceRule
OrChoiceRule.description: A choice rule that evaluates to true when any nested rule is true. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Or.title: Or
Or.description: An array of choice rules where at least one must evaluate to true for this rule to match. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NotChoiceRule.title: NotChoiceRule
NotChoiceRule.description: A choice rule that evaluates to true when the nested rule is false. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Not.title: Not
Not.description: A single choice rule that is negated — this rule matches when the nested rule does not. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

VariableChoiceRule.title: VariableChoiceRule
VariableChoiceRule.description: A choice rule that compares a variable from the flow state against a value using a comparison operator. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Variable.title: Variable
Variable.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a value in the flow state to evaluate. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

BooleanEquals.title: BooleanEquals
BooleanEquals.description: Matches if the variable equals the specified boolean value. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

BooleanEqualsPath.title: BooleanEqualsPath
BooleanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a boolean value to compare for equality. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

IsBoolean.title: IsBoolean
IsBoolean.description: When true, matches if the variable is a boolean (true or false). When false, matches if it is not a boolean. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

IsNull.title: IsNull
IsNull.description: When true, matches if the variable is null. When false, matches if it is not null. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

IsNumeric.title: IsNumeric
IsNumeric.description: When true, matches if the variable is a number (integer or float). When false, matches if it is not a number. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

IsPresent.title: IsPresent
IsPresent.description: When true, matches if the variable's JSONPath points to a valid location in the flow state. When false, matches if it does not. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

IsString.title: IsString
IsString.description: When true, matches if the variable is a string. When false, matches if it is not a string. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

IsTimestamp.title: IsTimestamp
IsTimestamp.description: When true, matches if the variable is formatted as an RFC 3339 timestamp. When false, matches if it is not. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericEquals.title: NumericEquals
NumericEquals.description: Matches if the variable equals the specified numeric value. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericEqualsPath.title: NumericEqualsPath
NumericEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a numeric value to compare for equality. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericGreaterThan.title: NumericGreaterThan
NumericGreaterThan.description: Matches if the variable is greater than the specified numeric value. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericGreaterThanPath.title: NumericGreaterThanPath
NumericGreaterThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a numeric value for a greater-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericGreaterThanEquals.title: NumericGreaterThanEquals
NumericGreaterThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is greater than or equal to the specified numeric value. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericGreaterThanEqualsPath.title: NumericGreaterThanEqualsPath
NumericGreaterThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a numeric value for a greater-than-or-equal comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericLessThan.title: NumericLessThan
NumericLessThan.description: Matches if the variable is less than the specified numeric value. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericLessThanPath.title: NumericLessThanPath
NumericLessThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a numeric value for a less-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericLessThanEquals.title: NumericLessThanEquals
NumericLessThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is less than or equal to the specified numeric value. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NumericLessThanEqualsPath.title: NumericLessThanEqualsPath
NumericLessThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a numeric value for a less-than-or-equal comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringEquals.title: StringEquals
StringEquals.description: Matches if the variable equals the specified string. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringEqualsPath.title: StringEqualsPath
StringEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a string value to compare for equality. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringGreaterThan.title: StringGreaterThan
StringGreaterThan.description: Matches if the variable is lexicographically greater than the specified string. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringGreaterThanPath.title: StringGreaterThanPath
StringGreaterThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a string value for a lexicographic greater-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringGreaterThanEquals.title: StringGreaterThanEquals
StringGreaterThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is lexicographically greater than or equal to the specified string. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringGreaterThanEqualsPath.title: StringGreaterThanEqualsPath
StringGreaterThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a string value for a lexicographic greater-than-or-equal comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringLessThan.title: StringLessThan
StringLessThan.description: Matches if the variable is lexicographically less than the specified string. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringLessThanPath.title: StringLessThanPath
StringLessThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a string value for a lexicographic less-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringLessThanEquals.title: StringLessThanEquals
StringLessThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is lexicographically less than or equal to the specified string. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringLessThanEqualsPath.title: StringLessThanEqualsPath
StringLessThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a string value for a lexicographic less-than-or-equal comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

StringMatches.title: StringMatches
StringMatches.description: Matches if the variable matches the specified pattern. Supports wildcard characters (*). See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampEquals.title: TimestampEquals
TimestampEquals.description: Matches if the variable equals the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampEqualsPath.title: TimestampEqualsPath
TimestampEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp to compare for equality. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampGreaterThan.title: TimestampGreaterThan
TimestampGreaterThan.description: Matches if the variable is later than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampGreaterThanPath.title: TimestampGreaterThanPath
TimestampGreaterThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for a later-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampGreaterThanEquals.title: TimestampGreaterThanEquals
TimestampGreaterThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is equal to or later than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampGreaterThanEqualsPath.title: TimestampGreaterThanEqualsPath
TimestampGreaterThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for an equal-to-or-later-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThan.title: TimestampLessThan
TimestampLessThan.description: Matches if the variable is earlier than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThanPath.title: TimestampLessThanPath
TimestampLessThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for an earlier-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThanEquals.title: TimestampLessThanEquals
TimestampLessThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is equal to or earlier than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThanEqualsPath.title: TimestampLessThanEqualsPath
TimestampLessThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for an equal-to-or-earlier-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

ChoiceRule.title: ChoiceRule
ChoiceRule.description: A rule used within Choice state branching logic. Can be a variable comparison, or a logical combination using And, Or, or Not. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

AndChoiceRuleRoot.title: AndChoiceRuleRoot
AndChoiceRuleRoot.description: A top-level choice rule requiring all nested rules to be true. Includes a Next property to specify the target state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

And.title: And
And.description: An array of choice rules that must all evaluate to true for this rule to match. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the state to transition to if this rule matches. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

OrChoiceRuleRoot.title: OrChoiceRuleRoot
OrChoiceRuleRoot.description: A top-level choice rule requiring at least one nested rule to be true. Includes a Next property to specify the target state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Or.title: Or
Or.description: An array of choice rules where at least one must evaluate to true for this rule to match. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the state to transition to if this rule matches. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

NotChoiceRuleRoot.title: NotChoiceRuleRoot
NotChoiceRuleRoot.description: A top-level choice rule that negates a nested rule. Includes a Next property to specify the target state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Not.title: Not
Not.description: A single choice rule that is negated — this rule matches when the nested rule does not. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Next.title: Next

VariableChoiceRuleRoot.title: VariableChoiceRuleRoot
VariableChoiceRuleRoot.description: A top-level choice rule that compares a variable against a value. Includes a Next property to specify the target state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the state to transition to if this rule matches. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampGreaterThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is equal to or later than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampGreaterThanEqualsPath.title: TimestampGreaterThanEqualsPath
TimestampGreaterThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for an equal-to-or-later-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThan.title: TimestampLessThan
TimestampLessThan.description: Matches if the variable is earlier than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThanPath.title: TimestampLessThanPath
TimestampLessThanPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for an earlier-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThanEquals.title: TimestampLessThanEquals
TimestampLessThanEquals.description: Matches if the variable is equal to or earlier than the specified RFC 3339 timestamp. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

TimestampLessThanEqualsPath.title: TimestampLessThanEqualsPath
TimestampLessThanEqualsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing an RFC 3339 timestamp for an equal-to-or-earlier-than comparison. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

ChoiceRuleRoot.title: ChoiceRuleRoot
ChoiceRuleRoot.description: A top-level choice rule within the Choices array. Must include a Next property to specify the target state on match. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

ChoiceState.title: ChoiceState
ChoiceState.description: Adds branching logic to a flow. Evaluates an array of choice rules sequentially and transitions to the state specified by the first matching rule. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "Choice" to indicate this state provides branching logic. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of this state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Choices.title: Choices
Choices.description: An array of choice rules evaluated sequentially. The first matching rule determines the next state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

Default.title: Default
Default.description: The state to transition to if no rule in Choices matches. If unset and no rules match, the run terminates with an error. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/choice_state for more information.

ExpressionEvalState.title: ExpressionEvalState
ExpressionEvalState.description: Evaluates expressions and stores results in the flow state without invoking an external action. Supports constants, JSONPath references (keys ending in ".$"), and expressions (keys ending in ".="). See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

Parameters.title: Parameters
Parameters.description: Object containing constants, JSONPath references (keys ending in ".$"), or expressions (keys ending in ".=") to evaluate. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "ExpressionEval" to indicate this state evaluates expressions. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of this state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the next state to transition to. Mutually exclusive with End. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

End.title: End
End.description: When true, the flow run terminates successfully after this state completes. Mutually exclusive with Next. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

ResultPath.title: ResultPath
ResultPath.description: A JSONPath expression specifying where computed values are stored in the flow state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/expressions for more information.

FailState.title: FailState
FailState.description: Terminates the flow run and marks it as a failure. The Error and Cause fields provide informative details for users reviewing the failure. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "Fail" to indicate this state terminates the run with a failure. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of this state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

Cause.title: Cause
Cause.description: A descriptive explanation of the failure. Mutually exclusive with CausePath. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

CausePath.title: CausePath
CausePath.description: A JSONPath expression to extract the failure cause from the current flow data. Mutually exclusive with Cause. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

Error.title: Error
Error.description: An error code or short identifier for the failure. Mutually exclusive with ErrorPath. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

ErrorPath.title: ErrorPath
ErrorPath.description: A JSONPath expression to extract the error identifier from the current flow data. Mutually exclusive with Error. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/fail_state for more information.

PassState.title: PassState
PassState.description: Passes input to output, optionally transforming data, without executing any external work. Useful for data manipulation, restructuring run state, or serving as a terminal success state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

Parameters.title: Parameters
Parameters.description: Object containing constants, JSONPath references (keys ending in ".$"), or expressions (keys ending in ".=") for output. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "Pass" to indicate this state passes input to output without performing work. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of this state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the next state to transition to. Mutually exclusive with End. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

End.title: End
End.description: When true, the flow run terminates successfully after this state completes. Mutually exclusive with Next. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

InputPath.title: InputPath
InputPath.description: A JSONPath expression selecting source data from the current run state. Most useful when combined with ResultPath for data relocation. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

ResultPath.title: ResultPath
ResultPath.description: A JSONPath expression designating where processed data is placed in the output. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

Result.title: Result
Result.description: Static payload data to use as the state's output, allowing you to inject fixed values into the flow state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/pass_state for more information.

WaitState.title: WaitState
WaitState.description: Pauses flow execution for a specified duration or until a deadline. Exactly one of Seconds, Timestamp, SecondsPath, or TimestampPath must be provided. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: Must be "Wait" to indicate this state pauses flow execution. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: An optional human-readable description of this state. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

Next.title: Next
Next.description: The name of the next state to transition to after waiting. Mutually exclusive with End. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

End.title: End
End.description: When true, the flow run terminates successfully after waiting. Mutually exclusive with Next. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

Timestamp.title: Timestamp
Timestamp.description: An RFC 3339 timestamp deadline, after which the run should resume. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

TimestampPath.title: TimestampPath
TimestampPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing a deadline timestamp from the current flow data. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

Seconds.title: Seconds
Seconds.description: The number of seconds to wait before resuming. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.

SecondsPath.title: SecondsPath
SecondsPath.description: A JSONPath expression referencing the number of seconds to wait from the current flow data. See https://docs.globus.org/api/flows/authoring-flows/wait_state for more information.
